Test if the switch changes (for the start type) modifies well the delay field If the switch for the start type is ON, the delay field is enabled.
changeRepeatOnCheckboxChanges() - Method in class pylapp.smoothclicker.android.uiautomator.UIAutomatorTestClickerActivity
Test if the endless repeat checkbox changes modifies well the repeat field If the check box for the endless repeat is checked, the repeat field is disabled If the check box for the endless repeat is unchecked, the repeat field is enabled
